pr_title: Fix azure and azure-samples test for cosmos, aks, sql

timeline.message: fix: cosmos, aks, sql in azure and azure-sample
feat: ignore acs error as it will be deprecated

timeline.bodyText: Please double check the recorded json for id and secret.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Yes, I've check for it. The clientId will be contained in record, and the secret will not. Secret is in the PUT body, and the record didn't record the request body.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText: Like previous in the AKS test.
replies.author: ChenTanyi
